title: Sensor Dashboard
summary: NOTE: This is a development tool!
description: A development tool for visually inspecting all sensor data from an Android Wear device.Only works with Android Wear for now!Get the source code from: https://github.com/pocmo/SensorDashboard
descriptionHTML:
A development tool for visually inspecting all sensor data from an Android Wear device.

Only works with Android Wear for now!

Get the source code from: https://github.com/pocmo/SensorDashboard
comments: @developers How to get values for a sensor (e.g. accelerometer) on mobile? I am developing an app that has to access accelerometer data once it is received from wear
Excellent application! We need to install the application separately on phone and wearable when running from the android studio. I faced this issue as a beginner with wearable app development.
How do i collect the sensor from the wearable? I have sync my android app to wearable but nothing is showing up on the app.
Exactly what I am looking for. A good logging device for watch sensor activities.
Hope to sèe logging into a file Very good and apt feature.i hope to see more xyz parameters corelated to the sensor name.
